properties.name: Haiti: Floods - Nov 2024
properties.description: From November 10 to 12, 2024, torrential rains fell across the entire Sud department, causing severe flooding. The municipalities of Les Cayes, Torbeck, Port-Salut and Saint-Louis du Sud are among the most affected. According to the DGPC, 3,558 families have urgent humanitarian needs in these four municipalities. [...] Needs assessments are continuing and humanitarian partners are preparing their interventions, particularly in terms of food assistance, hygiene kits, school kits and WASH kits. ([OCHA, 15 Nov 2024](https://reliefweb.int/node/4110861/))
